long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will make all of your friends think that you are the funniest person in the world. Have you ever seen a word that ends with -er and thought to yourself "I hardly know her!"? Now you can cut out the middle man and skip the thinking all together! This chrome extension will present you with the funniest joke of all time at every possible instance!
